@DineshDSouza @realDonaldTrump It prevents undereporting covid19 deaths. Also technically you do not die because of covid19, but because other organs can't simply cope anymore.. 

Also NY State simply does not have enough coroners to perform hunderds of autopsies on a daily basis..
